ValidationRule.description: Restrict users from selecting Premium placement products while saving products.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT($Permission.Exclude_from_Validation), NOT( ISPICKVAL(Id_Opportunity__r.Source_System__c, 'MIDAS')), OR(CONTAINS( Name,'Premium'),Name = 'Featured Product',Name = 'Advertising Clicks',Name = 'Joker',Name = 'Marketing Package') )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You are not allowed to select Premium Placement as a product.
